title: bhArata puNya bhUmi
sahitya:
bhArata puNya bhUmi jaya


anupallavi

  yamunai kAvEri gangaiyum unpAl imayavar tangum himAcalam unpAl


caraNam 1   munnaip-pazham pugazh shIrvaLam Ongum unnai ninaindiDil pAvam nIngum
 ponni vANi aruL shelvar pugazhnda braghma viSNu shankaranum magizhnda
  caraNam 2    tUya tangam oLi kunruvaduNDO sUrya candranoLi manguvaduNDO
 mAya ulagu tavap-pudalvan gAndhi tannAl nI peruvAi sukha shAnti
